Html:
Hello,
I am creating a tooltip for my marker, but the strokes and hiding it.
i want the tootip to be shown above the strokes.
how can i do dat?

GMapRoute r = new GMapRoute(route, "my route");
r.Stroke.Width = 9;
if use same overlay all routes would be rendered 'at the bottom', if you use more than one overlay, add that layer with routes first
